ðŸ“– Summary: Opcode is a desktop application built with Tauri 2 that provides a GUI for managing Claude Code sessions and creating custom agents. It aims to bridge the gap between command-line tools and a visual experience for AI-assisted development, offering features like usage tracking, project management, and background agent execution.
